generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings, including a red bicycle lane and white directional arrows, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and some vegetation, and also along the left side next to parked cars and a wall.
- building: A multi-story building with a facade covered in ivy is visible on the left side of the road, and another building with a modern design is on the right side.
- wall: A white wall with some graffiti is visible on the left side of the road, running parallel to the sidewalk.
- fence: There is a low fence or barrier along the sidewalk on the right side of the road, near the building.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including one with a parking sign on the left side of the road and another with a traffic sign on the right side.
- traffic sign: A blue and white "P" parking sign is visible on the left side of the road, and a circular "No Entry" sign is visible on the right side.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along both sides of the road, providing greenery and shade.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible riding a bicycle on the road, positioned in the middle of the frame.
- rider: The person riding the bicycle is classified as a rider, as they are using a bicycle to move.
- car: Several cars are parked along the left side of the road, and a few are visible driving in the distance.
- motorcycle: No motorcycles are visible in the image.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible being ridden by a person in the middle of the road.
- truck: No trucks are visible in the image.
- bus: No buses are visible in the image.
- train: No trains are visible in the image.
- scooter: No scooters are visible in the image.
